descricao: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
ajuda: ARIA role must be appropriate for the element

descricao: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
ajuda: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

descricao: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
ajuda: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

descricao: Ensures every form element has a label
Ensures the page has only one main landmark and each iframe in the page has at most one main landmark
ajuda: Page must have one main landmark

descricao: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
ajuda: Page must contain a level-one heading

descricao: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
ajuda: All page content must be contained by landmarks

descricao: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
ajuda: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable
